articles.title: Elon Musk says he is ‘disappointed’ in Trump’s ‘big beautiful bill’ - PBS
articles.description: Musk is criticizing the centerpiece of President Donald Trump’s legislative agenda, a significant fracture in a partnership that was forged during last year's campaign and was poised to reshape American politics and the federal government.

articles.title: Shaboozey on Why He Had Side-Eye Reaction to AMAs' Carter Family Line - Variety
articles.description: Shaboozey has elaborated on why he rolled his eyes at a line about the Carter Family having 'basically invented country' at the American Music Awards.
